programme.desc: The third day at the Des Moines Golf and Country Club, which featured 12 singles matches, at the biennial women's tournament between Europe and the United States concluded. At the tournament held two years ago, the Americans entered the final day needing to claim 8.5 points to overturn 10-6 deficit, and this exactly what they did as they won the session 8.5-3.5 to claim a sensational win by an overall score of 14.5-13.5, and thus claim the biggest comeback victory in the history of the competition

Netherlands league: NAC - PSV
programme.desc: Eredivisie je najvišje rangirano klubsko nogometno tekmovanje na Nizozemskem. Liga je bila ustanovljena leta 1956. Najuspešnejši klub je amsterdamski Ajax, ki je osvojil kar 33 naslovov državnega prvaka, sledita mu PSV (23) in Feyenoord, ki je tudi aktualni prvak (15). Od leta 1965 dalje je trem omenjenim klubom uspelo osvojiti večino državnih naslovov. Izjemi sta leti 1981 ter 2009, ko so se veselili nogometaši AZ-ja iz Alkmaarja ter leto 2010, ko je naslov romal v roke Twenteja

programme.title: Gillette World Sport, 31. del
programme.desc: Zanimiva oddaja o največjih športnih dogodkih na svetu iz drugega zornega kota

programme.title: SuperCup Hamburg: Poljska - Srbija
programme.desc: Najboljše evropske košarkarske reprezentance se pospešeno pripravljajo na EuroBasket. Močan turnir bo gostil tudi Hamburg, kjer bomo že dobili nekatere odgovore na to, kdo bo lahko resno računal na visoke uvrstitve. Kdo bo boljši na obračunu med Poljsko in Srbijo?

programme.title: Spanish league: Barcelona - Betis
programme.desc: Za Barcelono se po odhodu Neymarja v PSG in prihodu Ernesta Valverdeja na trenersko klop začenja novo obdobje. Za Katalonce bo proti Betisu štela le zmaga, gostje pa bi bili super zadovoljni že z osvojeno točko

programme.title: ATP 1000 Cincinnati - Finale: Kyrgios - Dimitrov
programme.desc: Masters v Cincinnatiju je še zadnji preizkus pred zadnjim letošnjim turnirjem za grand slam v New Yorku. Rafael Nadal in Roger Federer bosta ob odsotnosti Andyja Murrayja in Novaka Đokovića znova glavna favorita za končno slavje. Zmago pri moških brani Marin Čilić, pri dekletih pa Karolina Pliškova. Pred nami je nov teden vrhunskega tenisa

programme.title: Premier league: Tottenham - Chelsea
programme.desc: Tottenham in Chelsea sta v minuli sezoni praktično do konca bila bitko za naslov prvaka, ki so jo na koncu dokaj prepričljivo dobili modri. Tudi letos eni in drugi ciljajo na naslov prvaka, kdo pa bo uspešnejši na prvem letošnjem mestnem derbiju?

programme.title: Live! 2. SNL: Ilirija 1911 - Mura
programme.desc: Mura je z odličnim začetkom potrdila prvoligaške ambicije. Vsaj za zdaj izbranci Anteja Šimundže delujejo impresivno in bodo tudi proti Iliriji lovili vse tri točke

programme.title: ATP 1000 Cincinnati: Vrhunci turnirja
programme.desc: Vsi vrhunci mastersa iz Cincinnatija zbrani na enem mestu

programme.desc: Boji v Premier ligi se nadaljujejo. Če ste zamudili zadnji krog, si oglejte vse vrhunce, gole in podaje v naši oddaji

programme.title: Live! Premier league: Manchester City - Everton
programme.desc: Okrepljeni Manchester City v zadnji tekmi 2. kroga Premier lige pričakuje Everton s povratnikom Waynom Rooneyjem na čelu. Liverpoolčani so letos odločeni prekrižati načrte številnim favoritom in prvo priložnost bodo imeli že na Etihadu

programme.title: Spanish league: Pregled Rounda

programme.title: KHL - začetek sezone: SKA - CSKA
programme.desc: Nova sezona lige KHL se začenja z derbijem med SKA-jem in CSKA-jem. Prvi so šli lani vse do konca in dvignili Gagarinov pokal, drugi pa so se morali posloviti v četrtfinalu. Eni in drugi tudi letos ciljajo na naslov, zato si že na uvodu lahko nadejamo hokejske predstave za sladokusce

programme.title: Live! NFL Preseason: Cleveland - New York Giants

programme.title: World of Freesports, 33. del
programme.desc: Oddaja World of Freesports nam ponuja impresiven pogled na svet ekstremnega športa, ki je pogosto neupravičeno zapostavljen

programme.title: Live! Champions League - playoff: HNK Rijeka - Olympiacos FC
programme.desc: Rijeka Matjaža Keka se je iz Pireja vrnila z aktivnim rezultatom in dobrimi možnostmi za preobrat na svoji Rujevici. Olympiacos je ob igralcu več do zmage na prvi tekmi prišel šele v izdihljajih obračuna, vendar daleč od tega, da bi že imel dovolj visoko prednost za mirno povratno srečanje. V leta 2004 ustanovljeni Super ligi se meri 16 moštev, aktualni prvaki prihajajo iz vrste Guangzhou Evergrande, ki so s šestimi naslovi hkrati tudi najuspešnejše moštvo(c)

programme.title: Live! Champions League - playoff: FC Steaua - Sporting
programme.desc: Steaua in Sporting sta se na prvi tekmi razšla brez zadetkov, čeprav so Romuni zadnjih deset minut odigrali z igralcem manj. Steaua bo imela na povratni tekmi prednost domačega igrišča, Portugalci pa imajo na svoji strani za odtenek več evropskih izkušenj. Kdo bo bolje izkoristil svoje prednosti in slabosti tekmeca?(n)

programme.title: KHL: Dinamo Minsk - Jokerit
programme.desc: S polnim imenom Kontinentalna hokejska liga za ligo NHL velja za drugo najmočnejšo hokejsko tekmovanje na svetu. Prvič so tekmovanje izvedeli leta 2008, večina sodelujočih klubov je iz Rusije, dvaindvajset, po en klub pa iz Belorusije, Latvije, Finske, Slovaške, Kazahstana in Kitajske. Naslov brani SKA iz Sankt Petersburga, ki je bil v finalu s 4:1 boljši od Metallurga iz Magnitogorska(n)

programme.title: 2. Spanish league: Granada - Albacete
programme.desc: Segunda division (od leta 2008 naprej Liga Adelante; v prevodu pomeni »Liga naprej«) je bila ustanovljena leta 1929 in je druga najmočnejša nogometna liga v Španiji. V njej nastopa 22 klubov. Iz Segunde vsako leto trije najboljši klubu napredujejo v Primero Division, štirje najslabši pa izpadejo v Segundo Division B

programme.title: Avstrijska liga: Mattersburg - Austria (W)
programme.desc: Avstrijska Bundesliga je najvišje rangirano ligaško nogometno tekmovanje v Avstriji. Ustanovljena je bila daljnega leta 1911. V njej nastopa 10 klubov, ki med seboj odločajo o naslovu državnega prvaka. Daleč najuspešnejši klub je Rapid, ki je osvojil kar 32 naslovov, sledi mu Austria, ki jih je v svoje vitrine pospravila 24. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Salzburga(c)

programme.title: Spanish league: Girona - Atletico Madrid

programme.desc: Nekoč Primeira Liga, danes Liga NOS je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje na Portugalskem. V njej vsako leto sodeluje 18 klubov, vendar le pet je takšnih, ki so jo od leta 1934 (datum ustanovitve) tudi osvojili. Kar 81 od skupnih 83 naslovov je osvojila t.i. velika trojica (Benfica, Sporting in Porto) preostala dva naslova pa sta romala v roke Belenensesa in Boaviste. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Benfice

programme.title: Kitajska liga: Guangzhou R&F - Shandong

V leta 2004 ustanovljeni Super ligi se meri 16 moštev, aktualni prvaki prihajajo iz vrste Guangzhou Evergrande, ki so s šestimi naslovi hkrati tudi najuspešnejše moštvo

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics
programme.desc: Memorable contests from NBA history. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2008: Cavaliers at Celtics
programme.desc: From 2008: Cleveland at Boston in Game 7 of the Eastern Conference semifinals. The Celtics won 97-92, behind Paul Pierce's 41 points, and despite LeBron James' 45. Boston clinched the series. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2008: Lakers at Celtics
programme.desc: From 2008: Los Angeles Lakers at Boston in Game 1 of the NBA Finals. The Celtics won 98-88 behind Kevin Garnett's 24 points and 13 boards. In the loss, Kobe Bryant also scored 24. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2008: Celtics at Lakers
programme.desc: From 2008: Boston at Los Angeles Lakers in Game 4 of the NBA Finals. The Celtics outscored L.A. 57-33 in the second half to storm back from an 18-point halftime deficit and win 97-91. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2008: Lakers at Celtics
programme.desc: From 2008: Los Angeles Lakers at Boston in Game 6 of the NBA Finals. The Celtics won 131-92 and thoroughly dominated L.A. en route to the most lopsided win in title-clinching games in NBA history. Both Kevin Garnett and Ray Allen dropped 26 points in the win. Boston clinched the series 4-2 for its 17th banner. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Knicks at Heat
programme.sub-title: 2012: New York Knicks at Miami Heat
programme.desc: From 2012: New York Knicks at Miami Heat in Game 2 of an Eastern Conference quarterfinal series. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Knicks at Heat
programme.desc: 2012: New York at Miami in Game Five of an Eastern Conference quarterfinal series. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Pacers at Heat
programme.desc: From 2012: Indiana Pacers at Miami Heat in Game 1 of an Eastern Conference semifinal series. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Heat at Pacers
programme.desc: From 2012: Miami at Indiana in Game 4 of an Eastern Conference semifinal. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Heat at Pacers
programme.desc: From 2012: Miami at Indiana in Game 6 of an Eastern Conference semifinal. Dwyane Wade's 41 points powered the Heat in a series-clinching win after dropping two of the first three games to Indiana. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Celtics at Heat
programme.desc: From 2012: Boston in Miami in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference finals. Miami won 93-79, with LeBron James scoring 32 points. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Celtics at Heat
programme.desc: From 2012: Boston at Miami in Game 2 of the Eastern Conference finals. Miami won 115-111, despite 44 points from Boston's Rajon Rondo. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Heat at Celtics
programme.desc: From 2012: Miami at Boston in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals. Boston won 101-91, with Kevin Garnett scoring 24 points with 11 rebounds. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Heat at Celtics
programme.desc: From 2012: Miami at Boston in Game 4 of the Eastern Conference finals. Boston won 93-91 in overtime, with Rajon Rondo scoring 15 points with 15 assists. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Celtics at Heat
programme.desc: From 2012: Boston at Miami in Game 5 of the Eastern Conference finals. Boston won 94-90, with Kevin Garnett contributing 26 points and 11 boards. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Heat at Celtics
programme.desc: From 2012: Miami at Boston in Game 6 of the Eastern Conference finals. The Heat won 98-79, with LeBron James scoring 45 points. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Celtics at Heat
programme.desc: From 2012: Boston at Miami in Game 7 of the Eastern Conference finals. Miami won 101-88, with LeBron James contributing 31 points and 12 rebounds. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Heat at Thunder
programme.desc: Miami at Oklahoma City in Game 1 of the 2012 NBA Finals. Kevin Durant scored 17 of his 36 points in the fourth quarter as the Thunder beat Miami 105-94. LeBron James led the Heat with 30 points. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Heat at Thunder
programme.desc: Miami at Oklahoma City in Game 2 of the 2012 NBA Finals. The Heat evened the series at one game each with a 100-96 victory over Oklahoma City. LeBron James scored 32 points and Dwyane Wade added 24, while Kevin Durant led the Thunder with 32 points. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Thunder at Heat
programme.desc: Oklahoma City at Miami in Game 3 of the 2012 NBA Finals. Miami took a 2-1 lead in the series with a 91-85 win. LeBron James racked up 29 points and 14 rebounds for the Heat, who also got 25 points and seven assists from Dwyane Wade. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Thunder at Heat
programme.desc: Oklahoma City at Miami in Game 4 of the 2012 NBA Finals. LeBron James overcame leg cramps in the fourth quarter to lead Miami to a 104-98 victory and a 3-1 series lead. The Heat won despite 43 points from the Thunder's Russell Westbrook. (cc)

programme.title: NBA Hardwood Classics: 2012: Thunder at Heat
programme.desc: From 2012: Oklahoma City at Miami in Game 5 of the NBA Finals. The Heat won 121-106, with LeBron James getting 26 points, 11 rebounds and 13 assists. (cc)

programme.sub-title: A Sonoran Safari of Coues Deer, Javelina, Mearns Quail
programme.desc: Randy finally schedules a bucket list item: Coues whitetail, archery-style. Adding to the fun are javelina and Mearns' quail. Randy is joined by Wade Zarlingo, Jerry Pritchard and Larry Stickler(n)

programme.title: Long Range Pursuit
programme.desc: Aaron and Garrett tackle a four species spiral-horned slam in South Africa(n)

programme.title: Into High Country
programme.desc: Jason hunts pronghorn antelope in his home state of Montana with a rifle. After hunting several antelope, Jason finally picks up the Browning and looks for an exceptional pronghorn buck(n)

programme.title: The Western Hunter
programme.desc: Part 2. Nate Simmons is bowhunting bugling bulls on public land in the backcountry of Nevada. Elk encounters are on high, but Nate encounters a challenge he wasn't expecting(n)

programme.title: Wild Outdoors *
programme.desc: It's all about getting the youth out to harvest some deer. It's always exciting when youth hunters are involved(n)

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: David and Jeff are hunting the last half of rut in Iowa. David decides to hunt a new part of the farm and comes across a giant-framed deer named El Choppo. The next day, Jeff puts the arrow in the farm legend named SwingSet 10 after a two-year quest(n)

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: On the heels of a highly successful deer camp in Oklahoma, Mike rolls solo across America's Heartland to the big buck haven of southeastern Kansas. Assisted by 180 outfitters, Mike must rely on his own instincts and experience on a self-guided hunt(n)

programme.title: Bowlife *
programme.desc: It's November in Illinois and the rut is heating up. Levi's heart is set on a massive nine-point, but he is having a hard time staying patient as bucks funnel by his stand. Meanwhile, his dad is across the farm and is looking to fill another tag(n)
